list.confirmText: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
list.emptyStateSubTitle: Add flows by clicking the "add" button.

detail.labelLogExecuted: This flow as been executed "{total}" time in total.
detail.labelLogInstruct: Click on the log file to see details of flow executions and actions, or to replay the flow entirely.

trigger.name: Trigger
trigger.title: Select a trigger
trigger.helpText: Triggers are used to begin a flow. After selecting a trigger you will be given the chance to add conditions to refine the trigger or add actions to be executed with the trigger.

sequence.selectorHelpTextTrueCondition: This action or condition is applied if the expression on the left is "true".
sequence.selectorHelpTextFalseCondition: This action or condition is applied if the expression above is "false".
sequence.selectorHelpText:
Conditions are used to refine a flow and can either become "true" or "false".

Actions can be used to send emails, create documents or add tags. They can be executed on "true" as well as "false" conditions.
sequence.selectorHelpTextAddSequence:
Flows are started by a single trigger, but can consist of multiple sequences.

Sequences will be executed one after the other. You can end a flow at any stage by adding a "stop" action.
sequence.conditionExplainsDescription: Conditions are made using the Rule Builder. You can either select an existing rule or create a new one to set up this flow's condition.

flowNotification.messageDeleteError: The flow could not be deleted.
flowNotification.messageSaveError: The flow could not be saved.
flowNotification.messageRequiredEventName: Please choose trigger event before save.
flowNotification.messageRequiredEmptyFields: Please select a rule or action name before save.

actions.textStopFlowDescription: Subsequent actions/ sequences will not be executed.
